# Gate momentum rejection spike detected

**Severity:** HIGH
**Symbol:** XLV
**Category:** anomaly
**Tags:** auto-generated, anomaly, momentum, rejection_spike
**Date:** 2026-01-06 16:12:36

## Description
The momentum gate rejected 100.0% of trades over a 16 trade window. Last ticker affected: XLV

## Root Cause Analysis
High rejection rate at momentum gate may indicate: 1) Overly aggressive filters, 2) Market regime change, 3) Data quality issues, or 4) Strategy misalignment

## Prevention Steps
Review momentum gate thresholds. Consider: 1) Loosening filters during R&D phase, 2) Checking for market regime changes, 3) Validating data pipeline quality
